name: Wrapper
overview:
Renders following properties of content (component, liinear or stack container):
flex, opacity, alignment, animation, decoration, insets and dimensions by wrapping the content with matching widgets.

Params:
 - node: https://developers.supernova.io/data-contexts/data-model-objects/layout
 - parent: https://developers.supernova.io/data-contexts/data-model-objects/layout
 - injected #body: any content
